posts.post_content: This is a good card, but I wish this wasn't Exava, Rakdos Blood Witch. [Lyzolda, the Blood Witch](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lyzolda, the Blood Witch) is a fun card to build around, and I was hoping to get a card that would compliment her. Instead we get a smaller [Carnival Hellsteed](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Carnival Hellsteed) that acts as a lord for unleashed. I agree with Totema that she should have been Massacre Girl, instead of a Blood Witch.
posts.html:
This is a good card, but I wish this wasn't Exava, Rakdos Blood Witch. Lyzolda, the Blood Witch is a fun card to build around, and I was hoping to get a card that would compliment her. Instead we get a smaller Carnival Hellsteed that acts as a lord for unleashed. I agree with Totema that she should have been Massacre Girl, instead of a Blood Witch.

Posted By: Nagoragama (4/23/2013 5:28:30 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Loving this card, it's just what rakdos needed. Makes those late game [Rakdos Cackler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rakdos Cackler)s worth the mana to play them!  
  
Also combos with Undying, Evolve, Gavony Township, etc...   
  
Although she's not indestructbible, she can easily replace the falkenrath aristocrats in jund aggro decks or dirty naya.   
  
I personally will be using scavenge and unleash in Jung colors, pairing this card with [Varolz, the Scar-Striped](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Varolz, the Scar-Striped), [Vexing Devil](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vexing Devil), [Slumbering Dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Slumbering Dragon) and [Flesh//Blood](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Flesh//Blood)...   
  
Its fun so far i just gotta figure out how to beat control/tempo in game 1.
posts.html:
Loving this card, it's just what rakdos needed. Makes those late game Rakdos Cacklers worth the mana to play them!

Also combos with Undying, Evolve, Gavony Township, etc...

Although she's not indestructbible, she can easily replace the falkenrath aristocrats in jund aggro decks or dirty naya.

I personally will be using scavenge and unleash in Jung colors, pairing this card with Varolz, the Scar-Striped, Vexing Devil, Slumbering Dragon and Flesh//Blood...

Its fun so far i just gotta figure out how to beat control/tempo in game 1.

Posted By: Lord_of_phyrexia (8/14/2013 6:12:15 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Sigh... I wish she gave creatures unleash. As it is, you can only use her in an unleash deck or a wierd simic-rakdos-golgari deck, or any other deck that puts +1/+1 counters on creatures. I find this to be awfully limiting, since there are few ways to pop +1/+1 counters on creatures the turn they come out. Off the top of my head, there are allies, unleash, sunburst, bloodthirst... can't think of anymore. I'm sure there are propably a few other ways to do it (I'd be surprised if there wasn't!) but I'm not familar with them and I can't find the right phrasing to search for.  
  
Could make for an intersting combo deck, mind you.

posts.post_content: Quite possibly the sexiest maze runner in this set. I grade her just above [Emmara Tandris](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Emmara Tandris) and [Lavinia of the Tenth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lavinia of the Tenth) just because she is faster, First strike and she rewards her fellow mob haste. This card is Awe-some on so many levels. Oh and I also like her cameo in [Runner's Bane](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Runner's Bane) that was an awesome card and truly sad if you choose not to Unleash her.

posts.post_content: Being at the same point in the curve as [Hellrider](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hellrider), [Falkenrath Aristocrat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Falkenrath Aristocrat), and [Olivia Voldaren](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Olivia Voldaren) is pretty awkward, but come Theros this girl is going to be a Standard nightmare. Hell, you can even play her alongside Olivia to bite a creature and swing for 4 in the air on turn 5. (Because seriously, where are you going to play this if not Jund?)
